carousel.title: Your Gateway to Sustainable Business
carousel.description: Streamline Your Sustainability Initiatives with Unprecedented Transparency, Security, and Data Integrity.

intro.title: Getting Started with Green Building
intro.description: Begin your journey towards efficient carbon management and sustainability with Green Building. Our platform is designed to make it easy for you to calculate, monitor, and disclose your company's carbon footprint.
intro.item1: Access your personalized dashboard to view your progress
intro.item3: Showcase your commitment to a greener future

item1.title: Visualize and calculate
item1.detail: Visualize and calculate your company's carbon footprint and sustainability performance.

item2.title: Set, track, and achieve
item2.detail: Set, track, and achieve ambitious sustainability goals.

item3.title: Manage and disclose
item3.detail: Manage and disclose your carbon credits with transparency and security.

item4.title: Share your sustainability story
item4.detail: Share your sustainability story with your audience through personalized dashboard links.

testimonial.title: Testimonial
testimonial.subtitle: Trusted by Leading Companies
testimonial.description: GreenBuilding is proud to be the carbon management platform of choice for numerous forward-thinking companies across various industries. Our clients rely on GreenBuilding to streamline their sustainability initiatives and demonstrate their commitment to a greener future. Some of our valued customers include: "companies that are already using the platform"

reason.subtitle: Carbon Clarity
reason.title: Why Choose GreenBuilding
reason.description: The GreenBuilding platform combines the power of Power BI to offer a comprehensive carbon management solution that provides paralleled transparency and data security. By using GreenBuilding, you can:

item1.title: Accurately calculate
item1.description: Accurately calculate and disclose your GHG emissions for regulatory compliance.

item2.title: Build trust and credibility
item2.description: Build trust and credibility with customers, investors, and partners.

item3.title: Enhance your company's brand
item3.description: Enhance your company's brand image and attract eco-conscious stakeholders.

item4.title: Foster a culture
item4.description: Foster a culture of sustainability within your orzanization.

footer.detailSupport: Our dedicated customer support team is here to help you make the most of the GreenBuilding platform. Whether you need assistance with account setup, carbon calculation, or dashboard customization, we're just a click away. Contact us for any inquiries or guidance you may need.

powerBi.noAccessToken: No Power BI access token created
powerBi.description: Need an API token for scripts or testing? Generate a personal access token for quick access to the GreenBuildings Power BI.
powerBi.small: The token will expire on the selected date
powerBi.tokenGenerated: Tokens you have generated that can be used to access the GreenBuildings Power BI.

dialog.message: Are you sure that you want to proceed?

powerBi.msgForgotToken: If you’ve lost or forgotten this token, you can regenerate it, but be aware that any scripts or applications using this token will need to be updated.
powerBi.toSetNewExpireDate: . To set a new expiration date, you must
powerBi.submitThisForm: Submitting this form will generate a new token. Be aware that any scripts or applications using this token will need to be updated.
powerBi.tokenWillExpire: The token will expire on the selected date
powerBi.needPowerBi: Need a Power BI dashboard for scripts or testing? Add a embedded dashboard for quick view the Green Buildings data.
powerBi.invalidIfFrame: Invalid iframe code. Please check the format.
powerBi.pastedIfFrame: Paste the iframe code from Power BI here.
powerBi.makeSure: Make sure to include the entire iframe code.
